mal:area.comment:
This section details the MP services, the structures used by the services are detailed in section 4. Both the services and structures are defined in terms of the MO MAL, which is defined in [2], so it is possible to deploy them over any supported protocol and message transport.
The services defined here are also specified in terms of the COM, which is defined in [3].
To aid comprehension, several tables are included for each service and operation definition. The table formats are briefly described in section 1.8.2 and are the same as those used for the specification of the MO COM services in [3].
All service specifications in this document are part of the MP area, which has a short form number of '5'.
mal:area.name: MP

mal:service.comment:
Planning Requests are the main input to the planning function. A Planning Request is a container for the information needed to be exchanged between the requester and the planner.
The Planning Request Service allows the submission of Planning Requests with their associated status tracking.
mal:service.name: PlanningRequest
mal:service.mal:documentation:
The planning request service shall provides:
  1. the capability for submitting planning requests;
  2. the capability for updating planning requests;
  3. the capability for cancelling planning requests;
  4. the capability for retrieving planning requests;
  5. the capability for getting planning request status;
  6. the capability for monitoring planning request statuses using pub-sub;
Each planning request references a planning request template. The planning request templates are managed by the Plan Information Service.

mal:requestIP.comment: Submit Planning Request to provider. Returns the IDs of all created objects: ID of the Request Identity, ID of the Request Version of the created Planning Request. The status is not returned. The monitorRequestStatus shall be used. If an error happens no instance is created and no reporting on status is performed accordingly. The service provider publishes a RequestSubmitted event using the COM Event Service if there are no errors.
mal:requestIP.name: submitRequest

mal:field.name: identity
mal:field.comment: The name of the request identity.

mal:field.name: requestVersion
mal:field.comment: The requestVersion field of the submission is the planning request submitted to the service provider.

mal:field.name: requestIdentityId
mal:field.comment: The requestIdentityID field is a request identity ID returned by the service provider.

mal:field.name: requestVersionId
mal:field.comment: The requestVersionID field is a new request version ID returned by the service provider.

mal:errorRef.comment: The Plan Version ID does not exist.
Input validation error.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains argument names (first, String) and error messages (second, String).

mal:errorRef.comment: Duplicate request submission

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field may contain details on previous request submission.

mal:errorRef.comment: Unknown error, not handled by other errors.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains an error message.

mal:requestIP.comment:
Send an updated Planning Request to provider. It results in a new Request Version instance. Returns the new Request Version ID. The input structure is the RequestVersionDetails Object. It is required to send a complete RequestVersionDetails Object for the update, rather a 'delta'.
In future (next version of the BB) we can consider supporting the 'delta'. The service provider publishes a RequestUpdated event using the COM Event Service if there are no errors.
mal:requestIP.name: updateRequest

mal:field.name: requestIdentityId
mal:field.comment: The requestIdentityID field is the request identity ID of the planning request to be updated.

mal:field.name: requestVersion
mal:field.comment: The requestVersion field is the full contents of the planning request to be updated.

mal:field.name: requestVersionId
mal:field.comment: The requestVersionID field is a new request version ID returned by the service provider.

mal:errorRef.comment: The request version ID does not exist.
The Request Template ID does not exist.
The Plan Version ID does not exist.
Input validation error.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains argument names (first, String) and error messages (second, String).

mal:errorRef.comment: Unknown error, not handled by other errors.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains an error message.

mal:submitIP.comment: Send cancellation of Planning Request to provider. The service provider publishes a RequestCancelled event using the COM Event Service if there are no errors.
mal:submitIP.name: cancelRequest

mal:submit.comment: The requestIdentityID field is the ID of the Planning Request Version to be cancelled.

mal:field.name: requestIdentityId
mal:field.comment: The requestIdentityID field is the ID of the planning request version to be cancelled.

mal:errorRef.comment: The request version ID does not exist.
The request cannot be cancelled.
Unknown error, not handled by other errors.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains an error message.

mal:requestIP.comment: Returns the current state of Planning Requests subject to filter.
mal:requestIP.name: getRequestStatus

mal:field.name: requestFilter
mal:field.comment: The requestFilter field specifies a filter for planning requests.

mal:field.name: requestIdentityId
mal:field.comment: The list indexes in the response fields correspond to the same item. The requestIdentityID is the ID of request identity of the request matched by filter.

mal:field.name: requestVersionId
mal:field.comment: The requestVersionID is the ID of request version of the request matched by filter.

mal:field.name: requestUpdate
mal:field.comment: The requestUpdate is the request status of the request matched by filter.

mal:errorRef.comment: Unknown error, not handled by other errors.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains an error message.

mal:pubsubIP.comment: Subscribe to and receive Planning Request status updates. The reqistration is based on four keys. Key 1: Request identity ID Key 2: User ID Key 3: Request Status ID Key 4: Domain -- TBD -- The EntityKeys are Identifier,Long,Long,Long - the proposed keys do not work ! Notification Structure: RequestUpdateDetails (As it is in the current model amended with Request Instance ID)
mal:pubsubIP.name: monitorRequests

mal:field.name: requestUpdate
mal:field.comment: The requestUpdate field is the RequestUpdateDetails object.

mal:progressIP.comment: Get Planning Requests from provider subject to filter.
mal:progressIP.name: getRequest

mal:field.name: requestFilter
mal:field.comment: The requestFilter field specifies a filter for planning requests.

mal:field.name: numberOfUpdates
mal:field.comment: The numberOfUpdates field specifies how many UPDATE messages to expect. If NULL then a RESPONSE message is returned with all contents.

mal:update.comment: The list indexes in the response fields correspond to the same item.

mal:field.name: requestIdentityId
mal:field.comment: The requestIdentityID field is the Request Identity ID of a request matched by filter.

mal:field.name: requestVersionId
mal:field.comment: The requestVersionID is the ID of request version of the request matched by filter.

mal:field.name: requestVersion
mal:field.comment: The requestVersion field contains the Request Version that matched the filter. The RequestUpdateDetails (and the status) is part of RequestVersionDetails.

mal:field.name: requestIdentityId
mal:field.comment: The requestIdentityID field is the request identity ID of a request matched by filter.

mal:field.name: requestVersionId
mal:field.comment: The requestVersionID is the ID of request version of the request matched by filter.

mal:field.name: requestVersion
mal:field.comment: The requestVersion field contains the request version that matched the filter. The RequestUpdateDetails (and the status) is part of RequestVersionDetails.

mal:errorRef.comment: Errors in request filter.

mal:extraInformation.comment: Invalid filter. The error messages contain the filter field and error.

mal:errorRef.comment: Unknown error, not handled by other errors.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains an error message.

com:objects.comment: The Planning Request Service COM layer is built on top of data objects in the table below. A COM object wraps a corresponding data object (a 'payload') and adds a 'source' and a 'related' link. The 'source' link of COM object points to the entity that caused the 'payload' object to be created. The 'related' link of COM object points to the immediate parent COM object. The COM objects are used in the COM Event Service, COM Archive Service, and COM Activity Tracking Service. RequestIdentity object may have several RequestVersion objects that in turn may have several RequestUpdate objects.

com:sourceObject.comment: The user who submitted the Planning Request.
The user who submitted the Planning Request.
The entity that caused the creation of the RequestUpdateDetails, for example, a planning system.

com:relatedObject.comment: The related object is the current Request Version.
The related object is the current Request Status Update.

com:events.comment: The events are published using the COM Event Service. The COM Event Service registration (EntityKey) is specified in the COM Event Service. The body of the RequestSubmitted event is the ObjectId of the new RequestVersionDetails. The body of the RequestUpdated event is the ObjectId of the new RequestVersionDetails. The body of the RequestCancelled event is the ObjectId of the cancelled RequestVersionDetails. The source link shall be the object that caused the event to be generated.

com:sourceObject.comment: The user who submitted the Planning Request.
The user who updated the Planning Request.
The user who cancelled the Planning Request.

com:archiveUsage.comment: The COM objects may be stored in COM Archive.

com:activityUsage.comment: The COM Activity Service is not used.

mal:service.comment:
The Plan is the output of a planning process. The Plan is basically a container of one or more selected Planning Activities, optionally associated to Planning Events. In addition, the usage of Planning Resources may be contained in the Plan. The Plan may contain specific information from the planning process, which applies to the Plan as a whole.
The Plan Distribution Service provides access to plans and allows monitoring plans and plan statuses.
mal:service.name: PlanDistribution
mal:service.mal:documentation:
The Plan Distribution Service shall provide:
  1. the capability for listing avaiable plans;
  2. the capability for getting a plan;
  3. the capability for getting a plan status;
  4. the capability for monitoring a plan;
  5. the capability for monitoring a plan status;
  6. the capability for getting a plan based on query;
The data model supports multiple Plan Versions.

mal:requestIP.comment: Returns a list of plans subject to filter.
mal:requestIP.name: listPlans

mal:request.comment: The planFilter field specifies a filter for planning requests.

mal:response.comment: The list indexes in the response fields correspond to the same item.

mal:field.comment: The planIdentityID field is the plan identity ID of a plan matched by filter.
mal:field.name: planIdentityId

mal:field.comment: The planVersionID field is the plan version ID of a plan matched by filter.
mal:field.name: planVersionId

mal:field.comment: The planInformation field is the planInformation object of a plan matched by filter.
mal:field.name: planInformation

mal:field.comment: The status field is the plan status of a plan matched by filter.
mal:field.name: status

mal:errorRef.comment: Errors in plan filter.

mal:extraInformation.comment: Invalid filter. The error messages contain the filter field and error.

mal:errorRef.comment: Unknown error, not handled by other errors.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains an error message.

mal:requestIP.comment: Get plan contents by plan identity ID or plan version ID.
mal:requestIP.name: getPlan

mal:request.comment: If all request fields are NULL then returns the latest PlanVersionDetails object.

mal:field.comment: The planIdentityID field is the plan identity ID of a plan to be retrieved.
mal:field.name: planIdentityId

mal:response.comment: The list indexes in the response fields correspond to the same item.

mal:field.comment: The planVersionID field is the plan identity ID of the retrieved plan.
mal:field.name: planVersionId

mal:field.comment: The planVersion field is the contents of the retrieved plan version.
mal:field.name: planVersion

mal:errorRef.comment: Plan identity ID does not exist.
Plan Version ID does not exist.
Unknown error, not handled by other errors.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains an error message.

mal:requestIP.comment: Get plan status by plan identity ID or plan version ID.
mal:requestIP.name: getPlanStatus

mal:request.comment: If all request fields are NULL then returns the status of the latest plan.

mal:field.comment: The planIdentityID field is the plan identity ID of a plan status to be retrieved.
mal:field.name: planIdentityId

mal:response.comment: The list indexes in the response fields correspond to the same item.

mal:field.comment: The planIdentityID field is the plan identity ID of the retrieved plan.
mal:field.name: planIdentityId

mal:field.comment: The planStatus field is the status of the retrieved plan.
mal:field.name: planStatus

mal:errorRef.comment: Plan identity ID does not exist.
Plan Version ID does not exist.
Unknown error, not handled by other errors.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains an error message.

mal:pubsubIP.comment:
Subscribe to and receive plan updates.
Subscription shall be based on: - (Domain is not a key, is always in the subscribtion). - PlanIdentity ID - Originator - Plan Status (e.g. committed, ...)
-- TBD -- The EntityKeys are Identifier,Long,Long,Long - the proposed keys do not work!
mal:pubsubIP.name: monitorPlan

mal:field.comment: The planVersion field contains the contents of a plan using the PlanVersionDetails object.
mal:field.name: planVersion

mal:pubsubIP.comment: Subscribe to and receive plan status updates. -- TBD -- The EntityKeys are Identifier,Long,Long,Long - the proposed keys do not work!
mal:pubsubIP.name: monitorPlanStatus

mal:field.comment: The planVersionID field is the plan version ID of the plan.
mal:field.name: planVersionId

mal:field.comment: The planStatus field is the status of the plan.
mal:field.name: planUpdate

mal:field.comment: The numberOfUpdates field specifies how many UPDATE messages to expect. If '0' then a RESPONSE message is returned with all contents.
mal:field.name: numberOfUpdates

mal:update.comment: The list indexes in the response fields correspond to the same item.

mal:field.comment: The planVersionID field is the Plan Identity ID of the retrieved plan.
mal:field.name: planVersionId

mal:field.comment: The planVersion field is the contents of the retrieved Plan Version.
mal:field.name: planVersion

mal:response.comment: The list indexes in the response fields correspond to the same item.

mal:field.comment: The planVersionID field is the plan identity ID of the retrieved plan.
mal:field.name: planVersionId

mal:field.comment: The planVersion field is the contents of the retrieved plan version.
mal:field.name: planVersion

mal:extraInformation.comment: Invalid filter. The error messages contain the filter field and error.

mal:errorRef.comment: Unknown error, not handled by other errors.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains an error message.

com:objects.comment: The Plan Distribution Service COM layer is built on top of data objects in the table below. A COM object wraps a corresponding data object (a 'payload') and adds a 'source' and a 'related' link. The 'source' link of COM object points to the entity that caused the 'payload' object to be created. The 'related' link of COM object points to the immediate parent COM object. The COM objects are used in the COM Event Service, COM Archive Service, and COM Activity Tracking Service. PlanIdentity object may have several PlanVersion objects.

com:sourceObject.comment: The user who submitted the original Plan Version.
The user who submitted the Plan Version.

com:relatedObject.comment: The related object is the current Plan Version.
The related object is the current Plan Update.

com:events.comment: The COM Event Service is not used.

com:archiveUsage.comment: The COM objects may be stored in COM Archive.

com:activityUsage.comment: The COM Activity Service is not used.

mal:service.comment:
Planning Data definitions form the Configuration Data that Planning functions must share in order to interpret the content of Planning Requests and Plans. It is Planning Data instances that are exchanged at Planning function interfaces within Planning Requests and Plans.
Some classes of Planning Data, including both Planning Activities and Planning Events, may be instantiated multiple times. In this case there may be multiple instance objects associated with the same definition - each requiring its own unique identity in addition to that associated with the definition.
The Plan Information Management Service provides operations for managing the Planning Request, planning activity, planning event and planning Resource Definitions.
mal:service.name: PlanInformationManagement
mal:service.mal:documentation:
The Plan Information Management Service shall provide:
  1. the capability for adding, updating and removing Planning Request Templates;
  2. the capability for adding, updating and removing Activity Definitions;
  3. the capability for adding, updating and removing Event Definitions;
  4. the capability for adding, updating and removing Resource Definitions;

mal:requestIP.name: addRequestDef
mal:requestIP.comment: Add a new Definition and Identity to the provider. Creates a new Identity instance object and a new Definition instance object.

mal:field.name: identities
mal:field.comment: The identities field is the unique Identity to be added.

mal:field.name: definitions
mal:field.comment: The definitions field contains the new Definitions to be added.

mal:field.name: idPairs
mal:field.comment: The response shall contain the list of object instance IDs for the Identity and new Definition objects. The returned list shall maintain the same order as the submitted Definitions.

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of Identity objects being added is invalid.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains a list of the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating request list.

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the Identity objects being added is already in use in the domain.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains a list of the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating request list.

mal:requestIP.name: updateRequestDef
mal:requestIP.comment: Send an updated Definition to provider. It results in a new Definition instance.

mal:field.name: identityIds
mal:field.comment: The identityIds field is the ID of the Definition Identity to be updated.

mal:field.name: definitions
mal:field.comment: The definitions field is the full contents of the Definition to be updated.

mal:field.name: defId
mal:field.comment: The defID field is a new Definition instance ID returned by the service provider.

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the supplied identifiers is invalid.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains a list of the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating request list.

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the supplied identifiers is unknown.

mal:extraInformation.comment: A list of the indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

mal:requestIP.name: listRequestDefs
mal:requestIP.comment: Returns a list of latest Identity and Definition object instance ids.

mal:field.name: identities
mal:field.comment: The identities field shall contain a list of Identities to retrieve the Identity and Definition object instance IDs for.

mal:field.name: defsIdPairs
mal:field.comment: The response shall contain a list of matching Identity and Definition object instance ID pairs.

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the supplied identifiers is invalid.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains a list of the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating request list.

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied identifiers is unknown.

mal:extraInformation.comment: A list of the indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

mal:requestIP.name: getRequestDef
mal:requestIP.comment: Get Definitions from the provider.

mal:request.comment: The list indexes in the request/response fields correspond to the same item.

mal:field.name: identityIds
mal:field.comment: The identityIds field is the object instance IDs of the Identity.

mal:field.name: definitions
mal:field.comment: The response shall contain the Definition objects.

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the supplied identifiers is invalid.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains a list of the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating request list.

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied identifiers is unknown.

mal:extraInformation.comment: A list of the indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

mal:submitIP.name: removeRequestDef
mal:submitIP.comment: Remove Definition Identity from the provider.

mal:field.name: identityIds
mal:field.comment: The identityIds field is the IDs of the Identity to be removed.

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the supplied identifiers is invalid.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains a list of the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating request list.

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied identifiers is unknown.

mal:extraInformation.comment: A list of the indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

mal:field.name: definitions

mal:field.name: defsIdPairs
mal:field.comment: The response shall contain a list of matching Identity and Definition object instance ID pairs.

mal:field.name: definitions
mal:field.comment: The response shall contain the Definition objects.

mal:requestIP.name: getResourceDef
mal:requestIP.comment: Get Definitions from the provider.

mal:request.comment: The list indexes in the request/response fields correspond to the same item.

mal:field.name: identityIds
mal:field.comment: The identityIds field is the object instance IDs of the Identity.

mal:field.name: definitions
mal:field.comment: The response shall contain the Definition objects.

mal:errorRef.comment: One or more of the supplied identifiers is invalid.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains a list of the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating request list.

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied identifiers is unknown.

mal:extraInformation.comment: The extra information field contains a list of the indexes of the erroneous values from the originating request list.

mal:errorRef.comment: One of the supplied identifiers is unknown.

mal:extraInformation.comment: A list of the indexes of the error values shall be contained in the extra information field.

com:objects.comment: The Plan Information Management Service COM layer is built on top of data objects in the table below. A COM object wraps a corresponding data object (a 'payload') and adds a 'source' and a 'related' link. The 'source' link of COM object points to the entity that caused the 'payload' object to be created. The 'related' link of COM object points to the immediate parent COM object. The COM objects are used in the COM Event Service, COM Archive Service, and COM Activity Tracking Service. RequestTemplateIdentity object has one active RequestTemplate object. ActivityIdentity object has one active ActivityTemplateCOM object. EventIdentity object has one active EventTemplateCOM object. ResourceIdentity object has one active ResourceTemplateCOM object.

com:sourceObject.comment: The user who submitted the Planning Request Template.
The user who submitted the Planning Request Template.
The user who submitted the Activity Definition.
The user who submitted the Activity Definition.
The user who submitted the Event Definition.
The user who submitted the Event Definition.
The user who submitted the Resource Definition.
The user who submitted the Resource Definition.
The user who submitted the Function Definition.
The user who submitted the Resource Definition.

com:relatedObject.comment: The related object is the current Request Template.
The related object is the current Activity Definition.
The related object is the current Activity Instance.
The related object is the current Event Definition.
The related object is the current Event Instance.
The related object is the current Resource Definition.
The related object is the current Function Definition.

com:events.comment: The events are published using the COM Event Service. The COM Event Service registration (EntityKey) is specified in the COM Event Service. The body of the RequestTemplateAdded event is the ObjectId of the added RequestTemplateDetails. The body of the RequestTemplateUpdated event is the ObjectId of the updated RequestTemplateDetails. The body of the RequestTemplateRemoved event is the ObjectId of the removed RequestTemplateDetails. The source link shall be the object that caused the event to be generated.

com:sourceObject.comment: The user who submitted the Planning Request Template.
The user who updated the Planning Request Template.
The user who removed the Planning Request Template.
The user who submitted the Planning Request Template.
The user who removed the Planning Request Template.
The user who removed the Planning Request Template.
The user who removed the Planning Request Template.
The user who removed the Planning Request Template.
The user who removed the Planning Request Template.
The user who removed the Planning Request Template.
The user who removed the Planning Request Template.
The user who removed the Planning Request Template.
The user who removed the Planning Request Template.
The user who removed the Planning Request Template.

com:archiveUsage.comment: The COM objects may be stored in COM Archive.

com:activityUsage.comment: The COM Activity Service is not used.

mal:service.comment:
The Plan is the output of a planning process. The Plan is basically a container of one or more selected Planning Activities, optionally associated to Planning Events. In addition, the usage of Planning Resources may be contained in the Plan.
The Plan Edit Service provides the operations for editing the currently executing Plan (or Schedule). Operations are provided to Insert, Update and Delete occurrences of Planning Activities and Events. Note that inserting a hierarchical Activity will result in the creation of an entire tree of Activities. When deleting an Activity, deletion of any sub-tree of Activities is optional. Resources do not have occurrences, and so may only be updated.
mal:service.name: PlanEdit
mal:service.mal:documentation:
The Plan Edit Service shall provide:
  1. the capability for submitting, updating and cancelling Planning Requests into plan;
  2. the capability for inserting, updating and deleting planning activities into plan;
  3. the capability for inserting, updating and deleting planning events into plan;
  4. the capability for updating a planning resource on a plan;
  5. the capability for updating a plan status;
  6. the capability for applying a plan patch to a plan;

mal:submitIP.comment: Insert an activity into plan. The service provider publishes an ActivityInserted event using the COM Event Service if there are no errors.
mal:submitIP.name: insertActivity

mal:field.comment: The planIdentityID field is the ID of the Plan Identity.
mal:field.name: planIdentityInstanceId

mal:field.comment: The activityDefID field is the ID of the Activity Definition associated with this Activity Instance.
mal:field.name: activityDefId

mal:field.comment: The activityDetails field is the Simple Activity Details to be inserted.
mal:field.name: activityDetails

mal:submitIP.comment: Updates an Activity in a plan. The service provider publishes an ActivityUpdated event using the COM Event Service if there are no errors.
mal:submitIP.name: updateActivity

mal:field.comment: The planIdentityID field is the ID of the Plan Identity.
mal:field.name: planIdentityInstanceId

mal:field.comment: The activityID field is the ID of the Activity Details.
mal:field.name: activityInstanceId

mal:field.comment: The activityDetails field is the Simple Activity Details to be updated.
mal:field.name: activityInstance

mal:submitIP.comment: Deletes an Activity from a plan. The service provider publishes an ActivityDeleted event using the COM Event Service if there are no errors.
mal:submitIP.name: deleteActivity

mal:field.comment: The planIdentityID field is the ID of the Plan Version.
mal:field.name: planIdentityInstanceId

mal:field.comment: The activityID field is the ID of the Activity Details.
mal:field.name: activityInstanceId

mal:submitIP.comment: Insert an event into plan. The service provider publishes an EventInserted event using the COM Event Service if there are no errors.
mal:submitIP.name: insertEvent

mal:field.comment: The planIdentityID field is the ID of the Plan Version.
mal:field.name: planIdentityInstanceId

mal:field.comment: The eventDefID field is the ID of the Event Definition associated with this Event Instance Details.
mal:field.name: eventDefId

mal:field.comment: The eventInstance field is the Event Instance Details to be inserted.
mal:field.name: eventInstance

mal:submitIP.comment: Updates an Event in a plan. The service provider publishes an EventUpdated event using the COM Event Service if there are no errors.
mal:submitIP.name: updateEvent

mal:field.comment: The planIdentityID field is the ID of the Plan Version.
mal:field.name: planIdentityInstanceId

mal:field.comment: The eventID field is the ID of the Event Details.
mal:field.name: eventInstanceId

mal:field.comment: The eventInstance field is the Event Instance Details to be updated.
mal:field.name: eventInstance

mal:submitIP.comment: Deletes an Event from a plan. The service provider publishes an EventDeleted event using the COM Event Service if there are no errors.
mal:submitIP.name: deleteEvent

mal:field.comment: The planIdentityID field is the ID of the Plan Version.
mal:field.name: planIdentityInstanceId

mal:field.comment: The eventID field is the ID of the Event Instance.
mal:field.name: eventInstanceId

mal:submitIP.comment: Update of Plan status by a third party. The service provider publishes a PlanStatusUpdated event using the COM Event Service if there are no errors.
mal:submitIP.name: updatePlanStatus

mal:field.comment: The planIdentityID field is the ID of the Plan Identity which status is to be updated.
mal:field.name: planVersionInstanceId

mal:field.comment: The planStatus field the new PlanStatus.
mal:field.name: planStatus

com:objects.comment: The Plan Edit Service COM layer is built on top of data objects in the table below. A COM object wraps a corresponding data object (a 'payload') and adds a 'source' and a 'related' link. The 'source' link of COM object points to the entity that caused the 'payload' object to be created. The 'related' link of COM object points to the immediate parent COM object. The COM objects are used in the COM Event Service, COM Archive Service, and COM Activity Tracking Service. ActivityInstaceCOM object may have several ActivityUpdate objects. EventInstaceCOM object may have several EventUpdate objects.

com:relatedObject.comment: The related object is the current Activity Status.
The related object is the current Event Status.

com:events.comment: The events are published using the COM Event Service. The COM Event Service registration (EntityKey) is specified in the COM Event Service. The body of the ActivityInserted event is the ObjectId of the inserted activity. The body of the ActivityUpdated event is the ObjectId of the updated activity. The body of the ActivityDeleted event is the ObjectId of the deleted activity. The body of the EventInserted event is the ObjectId of the inserted event. The body of the EventUpdated event is the ObjectId of the updated event. The body of the EventDeleted event is the ObjectId of the deleted event. The body of the ResourceUpdated event is the ObjectId of the updated resource. The body of the PlanStatusUpdated event is the ObjectId of the updated Plan Version. The source link shall be the object that caused the event to be generated.

com:sourceObject.comment: The user who inserted the activity.
The user who updated the activity.
The user who deleted the activity.
The user who inserted the event.
The user who updated the event.
The user who deleted the event.
The user who updated the resource.
The user who updated the plan status.

com:archiveUsage.comment: The COM objects may be stored in COM Archive.

com:activityUsage.comment: The COM Activity Service is not used.

mal:service.name: PlanExecutionControl
mal:service.mal:documentation:
The plan execution control service shall provides:
  1. the capability for submitting plans;

mal:requestIP.comment: Submit Plan to provider.
mal:requestIP.name: submitPlan

mal:field.name: planId
mal:field.comment: The Plan Id

mal:field.name: plan

mal:pubsubIP.comment: Subscribe to and receive Activity status updates.
mal:pubsubIP.name: monitorActivities

mal:field.name: activityUpdate
mal:field.comment: The activityUpdate field is the ActivityUpdateDetails object.

mal:field.comment: Match by domain.

mal:field.comment: Match by source.

mal:field.comment: Match by request identity ID.

mal:composite.comment: Filter for searching plans. The 'filter' fields are ANDed. The list values of filters are ORed.

mal:field.comment: Match by plan version precursor.
mal:field.name: precursor
